translations.hero_subtitle: Transforming physical components into precise digital models with advanced 3D scanning and CAD reconstruction
translations.about_main_desc: Proguide is a premier mechanical reverse engineering firm specializing in transforming physical objects into precise digital models. We combine cutting-edge 3D scanning technology with expert CAD modeling to deliver solutions that enhance manufacturability, reduce costs, and accelerate product development.
translations.our_mission_desc: To revolutionize manufacturing processes through innovative reverse engineering solutions that enhance efficiency, reduce costs, and accelerate time-to-market for our clients.
translations.vision_desc: To become the Middle East's leading reverse engineering partner, recognized for our technical excellence and transformative impact on manufacturing industries.
translations.service1Desc: Comprehensive mechanical design solutions tailored to your specific requirements.
translations.service2Desc: Expert design of steel beam structures for construction projects of all scales.
translations.service3Desc: Precision modeling of sheet metal components for manufacturability.
translations.service4Desc: Design and optimization of aluminum profile structures for various applications.
translations.service5Desc: Advanced 3D scanning technology to create accurate digital models of physical objects.
translations.service6Desc: Virtual testing and simulation of mechanical assemblies to validate designs before production.
translations.service7Desc: Comprehensive PDM systems to organize and control product-related information.
translations.step1_desc: High-resolution scanning captures every detail of your physical component
translations.step2_desc: Raw scan data is cleaned and optimized for modeling
translations.step3_desc: Creation of parametric CAD models with design intent
translations.step4_desc: Virtual testing ensures performance meets requirements
translations.step5_desc: Complete technical drawings and manufacturing files
translations.testimonial1_text: "Proguide's reverse engineering services helped us recreate obsolete parts for our production line with perfect accuracy. Their attention to detail and quick turnaround saved us months of downtime."
translations.testimonial2_text: "The CAD models we received were production-ready and included manufacturability improvements we hadn't considered. Proguide's expertise added real value beyond just reverse engineering."
translations.testimonial3_text: "Their ability to handle large-scale structural components with complex geometries was impressive. The steel fabrication drawings were perfect and required no revisions from our side."
translations.team_description: Highly skilled professionals with extensive experience in mechanical engineering and reverse engineering
translations.team_member1_bio: Mechanical engineer with 12+ years experience in reverse engineering and industrial design
translations.team_member2_bio: CAD expert specializing in complex surface modeling and manufacturability analysis
translations.team_member3_bio: Specialist in parametric modeling and design for manufacturing
translations.cta_title: Ready to Transform Your Physical Components Into Digital Models?
translations.cta_text: Get in touch with our team to discuss your reverse engineering needs
translations.contact_address: 6917 Abu Abdullah Al-Sakhawi, Al-Qaswa, Al Madinah Province, 42391
translations.footer_about: Proguide is a premier mechanical reverse engineering firm specializing in transforming physical objects into precise digital models for manufacturing and documentation.
translations.blog_hero_subtitle: Expert perspectives on mechanical reverse engineering, 3D scanning, and manufacturing innovation
